morningEnergizer.title: Morning Yoga Energizer
morningEnergizer.description: Energizing yoga sequence to awaken your body and mind for the day ahead.

catCow.title: Cat-Cow
catCow.description: From hands and knees, alternate rounding and arching the spine. The pose mobilizes the whole spine and stretches abdominals, shoulders, neck, glutes and hip-flexors, which can relieve morning stiffness associated with mechanical back pain.

downwardDog.title: Downward-Facing Dog
downwardDog.description: From plank, lift hips to form an inverted 'V,' pressing heels toward the floor. This global posterior-chain stretch mobilizes calves, hamstrings, glutes and shoulders.

cobra.title: Cobra Pose
cobra.description: Lie prone, place hands under shoulders and, keeping elbows hugged in, lift your chest. Cobra strengthens spinal extensors and opens the chest—helpful for addressing flexion-relieved back pain from prolonged sitting.

warrior2.title: Warrior II
warrior2.description: Start with feet wide; turn the right toes forward, bend the right knee and extend arms to sides. Keep hips and shoulders square and sink into the lunge while lengthening the spine. This pose strengthens quads and glutes while opening hips and chest.

triangle.title: Triangle Pose
triangle.description: From Warrior II, straighten the front leg; hinge at the hip to lower the front hand to shin/ankle and reach the other arm upward. Stretches hamstrings, groin and chest.

video.title: Triangle Pose
video.description: Side body stretch and hamstring opening

forwardFold.title: Standing Forward Fold
forwardFold.description: Hinge at the hips to fold forward, letting the head drop and knees softly bend. Targets hamstrings, calves and lower back.

lowerBody.title: Lower-body Yoga Program
lowerBody.description: Targeted yoga sequence to strengthen and stretch the lower body, hips, and legs.

hipFlexorStretch.title: Half-Kneeling Hip-Flexor Stretch
hipFlexorStretch.description: In a lunge, slide the back knee further back, squeeze the glute and tilt pelvis forward. Stretches iliopsoas, relieving anterior hip tightness linked to prolonged sitting.

warrior2.title: Warrior II
warrior2.description: Start with feet wide; turn the right toes forward, bend the right knee and extend arms to sides. Strengthens legs and opens hips, great for building knee and hip stability.

triangle.title: Triangle Pose
triangle.description: From Warrior II, straighten the front leg; hinge at the hip to lower the front hand to shin/ankle and reach the other arm upward. Stretches hamstrings and groin.

video.title: Triangle Pose
video.description: Side body stretch and hamstring opening

hamstringStretch.title: Standing Hamstring Stretch
hamstringStretch.description: Step one foot forward, hinge at hips and reach toward the toes. A gentle stretch indicates tight musculature.

pigeonStretch.title: Pigeon/Figure-Four Stretch
pigeonStretch.description: Stretches deep gluteal muscles and piriformis; helpful for buttock pain.

downwardDog.title: Downward-Facing Dog
downwardDog.description: Comprehensive posterior-chain stretch, useful for calf tightness and plantar fascia symptoms.

upperBody.title: Upper-body Yoga Program
upperBody.description: Targeted yoga sequence to strengthen and stretch the upper body, chest, and shoulders.

cobraPose.title: Cobra Pose
cobraPose.description: Press the chest up while keeping elbows in. Opens the chest and strengthens paraspinals. Helps counteract forward-head posture.

crossBodyStretch.title: Cross-body Shoulder Stretch
crossBodyStretch.description: Bring one arm across the chest and gently press with the opposite hand. Targets posterior shoulder muscles and trapezius.

earToShoulder.title: Ear-to-shoulder Stretch
earToShoulder.description: Drop one ear toward the same shoulder and gently hold. Stretches upper trapezius and levator scapulae—common sources of tension headaches.

downwardDog.title: Downward-facing Dog
downwardDog.description: Strengthens shoulder stabilizers and stretches lats and chest. Comprehensive posterior-chain stretch.

catCow.title: Cat-Cow
catCow.description: Spinal flexion/extension mobilizes the thoracic spine and shoulder girdle. Recognizes whether upper-back pain improves with movement.

happyBaby.title: Happy Baby Pose
happyBaby.description: Lie on back, bend knees toward chest, grab the inside or outside of the feet and gently rock. Opens hips and provides traction for the thoracic spine.

eveningCalming.title: Evening Calming Yoga
eveningCalming.description: Gentle evening yoga sequence to relax body and mind before sleep.

listDescription.1: Releases back tension and muscle spasm
listDescription.3: Stretches hips and improves spinal mobility

childsPose.title: Child's Pose
childsPose.description: From hands and knees, spread knees, sit hips back onto heels and rest torso between thighs. Stretches lower back, hips, shoulders and neck.

video.title: Child's Pose Tutorial
video.description: Restorative pose for back and hip relief

happyBaby.title: Happy Baby Pose
happyBaby.description: Calming posture that gently stretches hips, inner thighs and spine. Helpful for pelvic-floor relaxation.

video.title: Happy Baby Pose
video.description: Gentle hip opening and spinal stretch

spinalTwist.title: Supine Spinal Twist
spinalTwist.description: Lie on back, draw one knee across the body and extend arms to the sides. Stretches glutes, chest and obliques and improves spinal mobility.

figureFour.title: Figure-Four Stretch
figureFour.description: Deep gluteal stretch. Use to relieve piriformis-related buttock pain and hip tension.

catCow.title: Cat-Cow
catCow.description: Gentle spinal mobilization that calms the nervous system and helps differentiate inflammatory from mechanical stiffness.

video.title: Cat-Cow Flow
video.description: Gentle spinal mobility for nervous system

downwardDog.title: Downward-Facing Dog
downwardDog.description: Slow, sustained hold provides full-body traction; good before bed to relieve postural compression.

powerYoga.title: Power Yoga Program
powerYoga.description: Challenging power yoga sequence to build strength, endurance, and flexibility.

listDescription.1: Builds shoulder endurance and posterior chain strength
listDescription.2: Strengthens back extensors and core muscles
listDescription.3: Develops lower-body strength through sustained holds
listDescription.4: Enhances hip flexibility and glute activation
listDescription.5: Balances muscle groups for optimal performance
listDescription.6: Prevents common injury patterns in active individuals

downwardDog.title: Downward-Facing Dog
downwardDog.description: From plank, lift hips to form an inverted 'V,' pressing heels toward the floor. Builds shoulder endurance and lengthens posterior chain. Hold for sustained strength building.

video.title: Downward-Facing Dog Power Hold
video.description: Shoulder endurance and posterior chain strength

cobra.title: Cobra Pose
cobra.description: Lie prone, place hands under shoulders and, keeping elbows hugged in, lift your chest. Strengthens back extensors and prepares for deeper backbends. Focus on active lifting.

video.title: Power Cobra Pose
video.description: Back extensor strength and chest opening

warrior2.title: Warrior II
warrior2.description: Start with feet wide; turn the right toes forward, bend the right knee and extend arms to sides. Sustained isometric hold develops lower-body strength. Keep strong engagement throughout.

triangle.title: Triangle Pose
triangle.description: From Warrior II, straighten the front leg; hinge at the hip to lower the front hand to shin/ankle and reach the other arm upward. Maintains engagement through legs and core while stretching side body.

video.title: Power Triangle Pose
video.description: Active side body stretch with core engagement

hipFlexorLunge.title: Hip-Flexor Lunge
hipFlexorLunge.description: In a lunge, slide the back knee further back, squeeze the glute and tilt pelvis forward. Enhances hip-flexor flexibility and glute activation; useful for runners and those with anterior hip pain.

video.title: Power Hip-Flexor Lunge
video.description: Dynamic hip flexor stretch and glute activation

hamstringStretch.title: Standing Hamstring Stretch
hamstringStretch.description: Step one foot forward, hinge at hips and reach toward the toes. Engages hamstrings and calves; important for balancing quadriceps-dominant routines. Keep active engagement.

figureFour.title: Figure-Four Glute Stretch
figureFour.description: Cross ankle over opposite knee and sit back into a chair position or lie on back. Provides deep external-rotation stretch to prevent piriformis and SI-joint issues.

dynamicFullBody.title: Dynamic Full-body Yoga Program
dynamicFullBody.description: Dynamic yoga sequence that mobilizes the entire body through flowing movements.

listDescription.1: Mobilizes spine and identifies stiffness patterns
listDescription.4: Strengthens legs and improves hip mobility

catCow.title: Cat-Cow
catCow.description: From hands and knees, alternate rounding and arching the spine. Warm-up to mobilize the spine; identifies segmental stiffness vs. inflammatory pain.

forwardFold.title: Standing Forward Fold
forwardFold.description: Hinge at the hips to fold forward, letting the head drop and knees softly bend. Hinge at hips to stretch hamstrings and lower back.

downwardDog.title: Downward-Facing Dog
downwardDog.description: From plank, lift hips to form an inverted 'V,' pressing heels toward the floor. Transition pose linking movements; engages shoulders and posterior chain.

cobra.title: Cobra Pose
cobra.description: Lie prone, place hands under shoulders and, keeping elbows hugged in, lift your chest. Dynamic backbend within a sun-salutation flow.

video.title: Cobra Pose
video.description: Dynamic chest opening and back extension

warrior2.title: Warrior II
warrior2.description: Start with feet wide; turn the right toes forward, bend the right knee and extend arms to sides. Strengthens legs and improves hip mobility.

video.title: Warrior II Pose
video.description: Dynamic leg strengthening and hip opening

triangle.title: Triangle Pose
triangle.description: From Warrior II, straighten the front leg; hinge at the hip to lower the front hand to shin/ankle and reach the other arm upward. Opens hips and side body.

video.title: Triangle Pose
video.description: Dynamic side body stretch and hip opening

hipFlexorLunge.title: Hip-Flexor Lunge
hipFlexorLunge.description: In a lunge, slide the back knee further back, squeeze the glute and tilt pelvis forward. Deepens front-hip extension; dynamic transitions challenge balance and identify hip-flexor tightness.

video.title: Hip-Flexor Lunge
video.description: Dynamic hip flexor stretch and balance
